title: Es6 js规范
content:
数组拷贝
const itemsCopy = […items];

取值方式
const [first, second] = arr;

函数初始化
function f3(a) {
const b = a || 1;
// …
}

function f4(a = 1) {
// …
}

输出数组
const x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
console.log(…x);

new Date(…[2016, 8, 5]);

数组遍历
let sum = 0;
numbers.forEach((num) => {
sum += num;
});
sum === 15;
